00045 /// String describing gc adjust algorithm/module
00046 #define SCIR "scale-intensities"
00047 
00048 /**
00049  *  Class for scaling cel intensities.
00050  */
00051 class ScaleIntensities : public ChipStream {

00055         ScaleIntensities(int floor, int low, int high, int ceiling, double low_pct, double high_pct, double gain_lock_pct, bool cel_out) 
00056         {
00057                 m_Type = SCIR;
00058 
00059                 m_floor = floor;
00060                 m_low = low;
00061                 m_high = high;
00062                 m_ceiling = ceiling;
00063                 m_low_pct = low_pct;
00064                 m_high_pct = high_pct;
00065                 m_gain_lock_pct = gain_lock_pct;
00066 
00067                 m_cel_out = cel_out;
00068 
00069                 setupSelfDoc(*this);
00070 
00071                 m_ChipLayout_obj = 0;
00072         }

00076         }

00079         // START Members that are requried by ChipStream
00080         static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) 
00081         {
00082                 doc.setDocName(SCIR);
00083                 doc.setDocDescription("Scale cel intensities.");
00084 
00085                 doc.setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00086         }
00087 
00088         static SelfDoc explainSelf() 
00089         { 
00090                 SelfDoc doc;
00091                 setupSelfDoc(doc);
00092                 return doc;
00093         }
00094 
00095         static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) 
00096         {
00097                 SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00098 
00099                 int floor = 1;
00100                 int low = 20;
00101                 int high = 50000;
00102                 int ceiling = 1000000;
00103 
00104                 double low_pct = 0.02;
00105                 double high_pct = 0.98;
00106 
00107                 double gain_lock_pct = 0;
00108 
00109                 bool cel_out = false;
00110 
00111                 fillInValue(floor, "floor", param, doc);
00112                 fillInValue(low, "low", param, doc);
00113                 fillInValue(high, "high", param, doc);
00114                 fillInValue(ceiling, "ceiling", param, doc);
00115 
00116                 fillInValue(low_pct, "low_pct", param, doc);
00117                 fillInValue(high_pct, "high_pct", param, doc);
00118 
00119                 fillInValue(gain_lock_pct,"gain_lock_pct", param, doc);
00120 
00121                 fillInValue(cel_out, "cel_out", param, doc);
00122 
00123                 ScaleIntensities *obj = new ScaleIntensities(floor,low,high,ceiling,low_pct,high_pct,gain_lock_pct,cel_out);
00124                 return obj;
00125         }

00142   /** 
00143    * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00144    * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00145    */
00146   static std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> getDefaultDocOptions() 
00147   { 
00148     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00149 
00150         SelfDoc::Opt floor = {"floor", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1", "1", "1", "1024", "probe intensities are floored at this intensity value"};
00151           opts.push_back(floor);
00152 
00153         SelfDoc::Opt low = {"low", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "20", "20", "2", "1024", "low intensity target value"};
00154           opts.push_back(low);
00155 
00156         SelfDoc::Opt high = {"high", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "50000", "50000", "2048", "5000000", "high intensity target value"};
00157           opts.push_back(high);
00158 
00159         SelfDoc::Opt ceiling = {"ceiling", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1000000", "1000000", "64000", "20000000", "probe intensities are clipped at this intensity value"};
00160           opts.push_back(ceiling);
00161 
00162         SelfDoc::Opt low_pct = {"low_pct", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.02", "0.02", "0.001", "0.25", "low target percentile"};
00163           opts.push_back(low_pct);
00164 
00165         SelfDoc::Opt high_pct = {"high_pct", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.98", "0.98", "0.75", "0.999", "high target percentile"};
00166           opts.push_back(high_pct);
00167 
00168         SelfDoc::Opt gain_lock_pct = {"gain_lock_pct", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.0", "0.0", "0.0", "0.999", "Transition from power series transformation to linear transformation at this intensity percentile."};
00169           opts.push_back(gain_lock_pct);
00170 
00171         SelfDoc::Opt cel_out = {"cel_out", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA", "true to create a cel file containing Scaled probe intensities This cel file may be used to evaluate the intermediate probe intensities."};
00172           opts.push_back(cel_out);
00173 
00174 
00175     return opts;
00176   }

00197   /** 
00198    * Caluculates medians for different levels (bins) of GC count
00199    * between 0 and binCount in size and appends to the chipBins. The
00200    * probes vector contains a list of probes that are thought to be
00201    * representative of background at different GC counts. The
00202    * probeGcVec contains the GC count for all probes on the array.
00203    * 
00204    * @param data - One microarray's worth of data.
00205    * @param binCount - Number of bins we are calculating GC content for.
00206    * @param chipBins - Matrix of chip by gc count containing the
00207    * median intensity for a collection of gc background
00208    * probes. Ordering is chipBins[chip][gcCount] and parameters from
00209    * latest chip in data vector will be appended as last row.
00210    * @param probes - Probes to use for estimating background for particular GC bings.
00211    * @param probeGcVec - GC count of every probe on microarray indexed by id.
00212    * @param warnings - Print warnings if a particular bin is empty?
00213    * For example: print a warning if there are no probes in the GC
00214    * count zero bin.
00215    */
00216   //static void learnParameters(const std::vector<float> &data, 
00217   //                            int binCount, 
00218   //                            std::vector<vector<float> > &chipBins,
00219   //                            /*std::vector<int> &probes, */

00221   //                            bool warnings);
00222 
00223   /** 
00224    * Give the background adjusted intensity for a particular probe on a particular chip.
00225    * @param probeIx - Probe of interest.
00226    * @param chipIx - Set of Chips of interest.
00227    * @param intensity - Current set of intensities.
00228    * @param return - background adjusted set of intensities.
00229    */
00230   float transform(int probeIx, int chipIx, float intensity, PsBoard &board) {
00231     return transform(probeIx, chipIx, intensity);
00232   }
